title: New: Blludd Relations – Even Steven
content:
It constantly feels like I’m playing catch-up with music at the moment.

Just as we hit our article target yesterday, this new Bullion/Jesse Hackett collaboration, Blludd Relations, dropped into my inbox. With an album out on Bullion’s own DEEK Label later this year, it’s seems we’ll be hearing a lot more from these 2. The new track, Even Steven, is a sedately funky grossed out jam that certainly wets the appetite of what’s to come.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
